questions: Q. 1. Trace the reason reason because of which Gandhiji started Satyagraha in 1919. [Board Term–II erm–II,,  2016]
answers: Ans. To protest against the Rowlatt Act.

questions: Q. 2. What did British do to repress the Rowlatt Satyagrahis ?
answers: Ans. To repress the Rowlatt Satyagrahis, British decided to clamp down on them.

questions: Q. 3. During which movement was the Indian tricolour first designed ?
Q. 4. Why did Gandhiji Gandhiji take up the Khilafat issue ?
answers: Ans. To launch a more broad-based movement and bring Hindus and Muslims together.

questions: Q. 5. What did the the idea of Satyagraha emphasize ?
answers: Ans. Appeal to the conscience of the oppressor.

questions: Q. 6. Which act gave the government power to supress political activity and detain political prisoners without trial ?
